title: RBI extends tenure of IDFC First Bank MD V Vaidyanathan for another 3 years
description: The Reserve Bank of India has extended the tenure of IDFC First Bank's Managing Director V Vaidyanathan for another three years, effective from December 19, 2024, to December 18, 2027. The bank's board had earlier approved his re-appointment following the expiry of his current term in December 2024. Vaidyanathan has been leading the bank since December 2018.
